title: Why MVC is so important
content: MVC allows the developers to mainrtain the true seperation of concerns, deversing their code between Model layer for data, the View layer for design, and the Controller layer for application logic.

title: Authentication vs Authorization
content: There is a difference between Authentication and Authorization. Authentication. Authentication means confriming your own identity, whereas Authorization means being allowed access to the system.

title: Object Relational Mapping
content: I really love learning about ORMs. It is really simplified the way I create queries in SQL.

title: Why Use Handlebars
content: Handlebars is one of the templating engine to keep your HTML pages simple and clean and decoupled from the logic_based JavaScript files.

title: What is Instance Method
content: An instance method is a function which is part of a class, and acts on an instance of that class.
